name: Tutor
description:
Tutor developed in 32 hours at gamejame organized in İstanbul Technical Univercity. Tutor is most loyal guardian, swear to portect the portal that leads to kingdoms capital.

There is 3 station in game. Medic station, Ammo Station, Upgrade Station. Arrows that places on groud shows where waves comes

Stations

- Medic Station

You can get medkit from Medic station. Medic station can be upgrade. Upgraded medic stations can generate medkit faster and keep more medkit.

- Ammo Station

You can get ammo for your guns and turrets from Ammo satation. Ammo station can be upgrade. Upgraded ammo stations generate ammos faster.

- Upgrade Station

You can upgrade stations and your guns. Also you can get turret to place and portect the portal.

How to Control ?

Move                           : A,W,S,D

Weapon Change   : 1,2,3,4

Interraction             : E

Place Turret             : Q + Mouse left click

Attack                          : Left Click

___________________________________________________

Thanks For Playing.Have Fun !!.
